RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT A.CUSTOMER_NO CUSTOMER_NO, A.FULL_NAME FULL_NAME, B.TELEPHONE TELEPHONE, B.E_MAIL E_MAIL FROM STTM_CUSTOMER A INNER JOIN STTM_CUST_PERSONAL B ON A.CUSTOMER_NO = B.CUSTOMER_NO
SELECT CUST_AC_NO from STTM_CUST_ACCOUNT where CCY= ? AND CUST_NO= ?
select DISTINCT CCY from STTM_CUST_ACCOUNT where CUST_NO=?
